content: part 1 to be published here on december 1st 2025 with updates through december this pattern is designed to accompany the 2025 folkestone harbour yarn naturally dyed advent calendar and will make a sheep inspired modular granny square mini blanket/wall hanging approx 76cm long by 52cm at its widest point yarn/tool requirements 24 x 10g/42 5m 75% superwash merino/25% nylon sock weight mini skeins in solid colours 1 x 20g/85m 75% superwash merino/25% nylon sock weight mini skeins in solid green 1 x 150g/640m 75% superwash merino/25% nylon sock weight yarn in cream/white/undyed 3mm crochet hook tools and notions stitch markers scissors or snips wool needle for ends blocking equipment yarn winder please note that this pattern will be written in u k crochet terms
